meanings.definition: Echeverias: a type of succulent plant
meanings.sent1: The echeverias in the garden are so pretty.
meanings.sent2: I bought some echeverias for my office desk.
meanings.sent3: The echeverias decided to have a dance party in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her love for echeverias bloomed like a colorful garden in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The echeverias swayed gently in the breeze, like nature's own little dancers.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the echeverias on display at the plant shop.
meanings.sent2: She collected various echeverias for her collection.
meanings.sent3: The echeverias gathered for a group photo, each one posing differently.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of echeverias, a colorful carpet under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The echeverias stood out in the garden, like a crowd of tiny succulent stars.
